sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-layout class="layout">
    <a-layout-header class="header">
      <a-row align="middle" justify="space-between">
        <a-col>
          <!-- 中间的三个按钮 -->
          <a-button key="1" class="header-button">首页</a-button>
          <a-button key="2" class="header-button">产品</a-button>
          <a-button key="3" class="header-button">关于我们</a-button>
        </a-col>
        <a-col>
          <!-- 用户头像和下拉菜单 -->
          <a-dropdown class="header-dropdown">
            <a-avatar size="large" icon="user" />
            <template #overlay>
              <a-menu>
                <a-menu-item key="user-center">个人中心</a-menu-item>
                <a-menu-item key="settings">设置</a-menu-item>
                <a-menu-item key="logout">退出登录</a-menu-item>
              </a-menu>
            </template>
          </a-dropdown>
        </a-col>
      </a-row>
    </a-layout-header>
    <a-layout-content class="content"> 您的内容... </a-layout-content>
  </a-layout>
</template>

<script>
import { Layout, Button, Avatar, Dropdown, Menu } from "ant-design-vue";
import { UserOutlined } from "@ant-design/icons-vue";

export default {
  components: {
    "a-layout": Layout,
    "a-layout-header": Layout.Header,
    "a-layout-content": Layout.Content,
    "a-row": Layout.Row,
    "a-col": Layout.Col,
    "a-button": Button,
    "a-avatar": Avatar,
    "a-dropdown": Dropdown,
    "a-menu": Menu,
    "a-menu-item": Menu.Item,
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.layout {
  height: 100vh;
  background: #f0f2f5;
}

.header {
  background: #001529;
  padding: 0 16px;
}

.header-button {
  margin-right: 8px;
}

.header-dropdown {
  margin-left: 16px;
}

.content {
  padding: 16px;
}
</style>
